parameters.content:
## URL META TAGS DATA
**This part** is used to parse long link data like title, descraption, image all them served in header with tags called. [URL metadata](https://ogp.me/)

## Switchy API Limits:
- 10.000 links/day.
- 1.000 links/hour max.
- 16 links /minute max.

values.stringValue: =<Optional: Slug is the path of shortened URL - default is random 5 chars>

values.name: tags
values.stringValue: =<Optional: Add tags if you need, each keyword seperated by "," for example: Marketing, Media, Shortened>

values.name: Custom Domain (CNAME)
values.stringValue: =<Optional: Use your custom domain linked to Switchy, otherwise keep it empty to use default domain swiy.co>

Favicon

parameters.content:
## Switchy API
**Create or Update** Link. [Based on their API docs](https://google.com)

# README
## N8N META Config
### 1- **Opengraph Image mode**: `screenshot` or `source` or `brand`
### - **screenshot**: _take a screenshot for web page based on longurl._
[![Screenshort Mode Demo](https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/53485029368_917acda850_o.png)](https://cdn.statically.io/gh/ARHAEEM/n8n-templates-demos/main/screenshots/n8n.io/og/mefwo.png)
### - **source**: _scrape the source longurl og image and use it_
[![Source Mode Demo](https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/53485194899_d6141292eb_o.png)](https://cdn.statically.io/gh/ARHAEEM/n8n-templates-demos/main/screenshots/n8n.io/og/cowyl.png)
### -  **brand**: _Generate blank background, color based on `Dark Mode` option_
[![Brand Mode Demo Dark](https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/53484898721_94e15670b0_o.png)](https://cdn.statically.io/gh/ARHAEEM/n8n-templates-demos/main/screenshots/n8n.io/og/gvhok.png) [![Brand Mode Demo White](https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/53485202839_680a5e825b_o.png)](https://cdn.statically.io/gh/ARHAEEM/n8n-templates-demos/main/screenshots/n8n.io/og/yguse.png)
### 2- **Dark Mode**: `true` or `false` (_Working with `brand` OGI mode only._)
- **true**: generate **black** patteren as background og image for the texts.
- **false**: generate **white** patteren as background og image for the texts.
### 3- **Brand Name**: Used for `brand` ogi background. The limit of brand name is 18 characters total.


## Switchy API Workflow Configuration
### This is part of Switchy API config i covered in this workflow.
| Input Field           | Description                                      |
|-----------------------|--------------------------------------------------|
| **`Switchy API Key`**       | _API Key for Switchy integration._                 |
| **`LongURL`**               | _The long URL to be shortened._                    |
| **`Custom slug`**           | _Custom slug for the shortened URL._               |
| **`tags`**                  | _Tags associated with the link._                   |
| **`Switchy Folder ID`**     | _ID of the Switchy folder to use._                 |
| **`Custom Domain (CNAME)`** | _Custom domain linked to Switchy._                 |


### This is public APIs I've Used in Workflow
#### Meta Data Stack
- **Manual Get Headers**: Custom HTTP request to fetch headers.
- **Dub.sh**: Scraping meta tags from web pages.
- **OpenGraph API**: Using OpenGraph to retrieve meta information.
#### Screenshot Stack
- **Method 1 - SCR**: First method for taking screenshots (API name microlink).
- **Method 2 - SCR**: Second method for taking screenshots (API name pxl.to).

# 💡FYI:-
- ### **This workflow can be for any URL Shortener by just changing the API Services for the shortener SaaS.**
- ### **Do not use it for spam purposes as the used APIs is mostly workaround methods and not for "Big Use Cases".**
- ### **Breaking the APIs will force me to not share them free. and yes this workflow not for productions.**
- ### **Support 1:1 not included with this workflow. post anything you have** [here](https://community.n8n.io) and mention my account @Nskha.
- ### **Follow my new templates updates** [on telegram](https://nodemation.t.me).
